holidays.title: National Fudge Day
holidays.description: "Oh, fudge!" said a confectioner who flubbed while making caramel, ending up creating something equally tasty.

holidays.title: Arborist Appreciation Day
holidays.description: Show your love and support to all professional arborists in the country this Arborist Appreciation Day.

holidays.title: Bloomsday
holidays.description: Commemorating the life and legend of Irish writer James Joyce on Bloomsday.

holidays.title: Fresh Veggies Day
holidays.description: Celebrate Fresh Veggies Day today by including them in your meals to live a healthy lifestyle.

holidays.title: International Day of Family Remittances
holidays.description: Observe International Day of Family Remittances by recognizing the contributions of hard-working migrants.

holidays.title: International Day of the African Child
holidays.description: The day focuses attention on the barriers African children face in order to receive quality education.

holidays.title: International WaterFall Day
holidays.description: Drive down to your nearest waterfall and marvel at its scenic beauty this International Waterfall Day.

holidays.title: Martyrdom of Guru Arjan Dev Sahib
holidays.description: Observe a day of worship and processions on the Martyrdom of Guru Arjan Dev Sahib.

holidays.title: National Casey Day
holidays.description: Celebrate this day with all those named Casey — not forgetting K.C. and Catharine.

holidays.title: National Mohammad Day
holidays.description: Are you ready to celebrate this day? Call someone named Muhammad and start having fun together.

holidays.title: National Richard Day
holidays.description: If you know someone named Richard, today is the day to reach out and celebrate them.

holidays.title: National Take Back the Lunch Break Day
holidays.description: Want to know why you need to take a lunch break? Read on...

holidays.title: World Sea Turtle Day
holidays.description: Let’s come together and raise our voices to prevent the extinction of sea turtles.

holidays.title: Youth Day
holidays.description: Remember the heroes of the Soweto uprising as we mark Youth Day in South Africa.

holidays.title: Tupac’s Birthday
holidays.description: He sold 75 million records, and positioned himself as a voice of social and racial justice.

holidays.title: JJ Subia’s Birthday
holidays.description: JJ Subia is the perfect definition of an internet sensation with a charismatic personality.

holidays.title: Phil Mickelson’s Birthday
holidays.description: With multiple championship wins, iconic shots, and a professional legacy, Phil Mickelson has created history.
